leathercap.name: Leather Cap
leathercap.description: A worn leather cap. It is your cap right?

leathercuirass.name: Leather Cuirass
leathercuirass.description: A cuirass crafted from leather. It is better than nothing.

leathergreaves.name: Leather Greaves
leathergreaves.description: A small leather covering for your legs. Don't take an arrow to the knee.

leatherboots.name: Leather Boots
leatherboots.description: A fairly comfy pair of leather boots. Keep your toes out of the dirt.
